title: One Day Repeat! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Time Loop
author: Kawata Gikyoku   川田戯曲
description: When I confessed my feelings to Sayahara Kiki, a classmate I dearly yearned for, she answered, '...I’m glad that you feel that way about me. Thank you very much. But I... can't go out with someone who has a face like a potato. I’m sorry.” I was so shocked that I thought I was going to vomit. I went to sleep with a broken heart, but when I woke up the next day... it turned out to be today again! Apparently, if you don't capture her heart, tomorrow will never come...!>
